sense.gloss: far away, distant place, a (great) distance, a long way off, afar
long ago, far back, far (into the future)
far, distant, far away, a long way off, in the distance
distant (past), remote (in time), remote, far-removed (in time)
distant (relationship or kinship), having little to do (with someone)
far (from something else in quality, degree, etc.), not similar, way off
reserve, constraint, restraint, modesty, diffidence, hesitation, holding back, discretion, tact, thoughtfulness
tour (by a sports team, performer, etc.), visit
pretending to respect (someone) while in fact staying distant, keeping at arm's length, giving a wide berth

sdata.j: ↑人間↑↓にんげん↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑永遠↑↓えいえん↓には↑生↑↓い↓きられないものだ。
sdata.e: Humans were never meant to live forever.

sdata.j: ここから↑遠↑↓とお↓くまで↑行↑↓い↓けるボートが↑欲↑↓ほ↓しいです。
sdata.e: I want a boat that will take me far away from here.

sdata.j: ↑国王↑↓こくおう↓はいつも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑褒↑↓ほ↓めるおべっか↑使↑↓づか↓いにうんざりしていたので↑彼↑↓かれ↓らを↑遠↑↓とお↓くへ↑飛↑↓と↓ばした。
sdata.e: The king was tired of his sycophants always praising him, so he sent them away.

sdata.j: バカンスに↑行↑↓い↓くのが↑待↑↓ま↓ち↑遠↑↓どお↓しい。
sdata.e: I can't wait to go on a vacation.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑敬遠↑↓けいえん↓する↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You had better keep him at a respectful distance.

sdata.j: ↑遠↑↓とおざ↓からず↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑正↑↓ただ↓しいと↑納得↑↓なっとく↓しますよ。
sdata.e: You will soon be convinced I am right.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はいつから↑家族↑↓かぞく↓と↑疎遠↑↓そえん↓になっているのか。
sdata.e: How long have you been alienated from your family?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓が↑実現↑↓じつげん↓する↑日↑↓ひ↓も↑遠↑↓とお↓くないだろう。
sdata.e: It won't be long before your dream comes true.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑解答↑↓かいとう↓は↑完璧↑↓かんぺき↓からは↑程遠↑↓ほどとお↓い。
sdata.e: Your answer is anything but perfect.

words.gloss: far away, distant place, a (great) distance, a long way off, afar
far, distant, far away, a long way off, in the distance
